Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier medical emergency at 35th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following an earlier medical emergency at 35th.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/State
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Michigan, 119th, Wentworth and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/State.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Michigan, 119th, Wentworth and 115th: due to, street blockage near 115th/State.

Allow extra travel time.
